question: Complete pseudocode for PROCEDURE Swap.
answer:
PROCEDURE Swap(Index1, Index2)
  Hold ← Values[Index1]
  Values[Index1] ← Values[Index2]
  Values[Index2] ← Hold
ENDPROCEDURE
